summary: Adds two new, unique two-handed swords based on the weapons of the same name from World of Warcraft. Both Ashbringer and Corrupted Ashbringer versions are included. Comes in 1k, 2k and 4k versions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url] 
[img]http://i.imgur.com/RvpbIj4.jpg[/img][/center][center][youtube]j3vzUJMlxDM[/youtube] [youtube]Yzp1iVKEo0I[/youtube] [youtube]XIkzvBLZv_A[/youtube] [youtube]Mp3cDcB1skQ[/youtube] [youtube]VR6TRnVdVMc[/youtube][/center] 

[b][center]FEEL FREE TO ADD YOUR OWN SCREENSHOTS! 
[color=#ffff00]BEST VIEWED ON NLA ENB![/color][/center][/b]
[b]About:[/b]

The Ashbringer and Corrupted Ashbringer are based on weapons from World of Warcraft. There is no real way I could try and fit these into Skyrim lore because let's face it, they're huge!

Glow intensity is based upon your ENBseries preset and may differ in comparison to the screenshots. This comes in 1k, 2k, and 4k resolutions.

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] Craftable (under Daedric) Ashbringer and Corrupted Ashbringer. The Corrupted version is an upgrade to the non and both are stronger than a Daedric Greatsword and have their own separate enchants.

[center][color=#ff0000][b]Do NOT optimize the textures! Some maps are purposely uncompressed![/b][/color][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Obtaining:[/b]

Craftable (Requires Daedric Smithing)
x2 Leather Strips
x2 Iron Ingots
x2 Steel Ingots
x4 Ebony Ingots
x1000 Gold

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the downloaded archive into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files:

Ashbringer - Johnskyrim.esp
Ashbringer - Johnskyrim.bsa

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:[/b]

Q. What did you use to create this mod?
A. 3ds Max, Zbrush and Photoshop.

Q. Why is it not red and yellow?
A. Because it would look even more unrealistic!

Q. Why isn't the end of the Ashbringer round?
A. I wanted to use the same model to keep the file size down.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

- None so far

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center][color=yellow][b]Please check out my other mods![/b][/color]
